reviewText:
I love this show. It is cute and romantic. Sibling incest doesn't bother me so this show didn't. I gave it a 9/10...

BE WARNED: Any DVD/Blu-ray that accepts ALL REGIONS are bootlegged. In Japan, any and all releases are restricted to the regional code that country uses. Companies in the US do it for their country's code. No company releases DVD's and Blu-rays on ALL REGIONS! This prevents reverse importing and exporting.

Also, this show was not licensed outside of Japan so anybody using codes other than 2 are likely distributing a bootlegged copy. Be careful.
